name: Indian Rice With Shrimp
recipeIngredient: 1 cup finely chopped fresh or well-drained canned tomatoes
3 1/2 cups chicken broth, homemade or low-sodium canned
1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
1/2 cup peas or diced zucchini, optional
1/2 pound medium shrimp, shelled and deveined

recipeInstructions.text: Follow the directions for Mexican rice, pureeing the cumin, ground coriander, turmeric and red pepper with the tomato mixture in Step 1.

When liquid has been absorbed in Step 3, submerge the shrimp in the rice, before covering the pot with the towel. Cover and continue as in main recipe. Stir to distribute shrimp. Serve hot, garnishing each serving with fresh coriander.
